metadata.title: CVE-2016-2505 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: mpeg2ts/ATSParser.cpp in libstagefright in mediaserver in Android 6.xbefore 2016-07-01 does not validate a certain section length, which allowsremote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service(memory corruption) via a crafted media file, aka internal bug 28333006.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
